verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Words and Music by Matt Crocker, Joel Houston & Michael Guy Chislett

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
CHORUS
Your life
Your life
Your life
In mine

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
VERSE: 1
Your thoughts
Your ways
Your mystery
Too deep for words
My spirit burns to worship You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
VERSE: 2
Your heart
Your plans
Your will for me
There's nothing else my soul desires
Than more of You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
BRIDGE:
Take my heart
Take my soul
Take my mind and I will
Give my thoughts
Give my all
Give my life to follow You
Take my hands
Take my breath
Take my dreams and I will
Lift my eyes
Lift my faith
Lift my voice and worship You

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
VERSE: 3
My God
My closest friend
I need Your love
More than my lungs
Need oxygen
